text:
Rockland Trust | Python Developer | Plymouth, MA | Full Time | Onsite | $120,000+

https://rocklandtrust.taleo.net/careersection/jobdetail.ftl?...

Looking for a startup-like position within a stable company? Our team is growing and we're looking for someone to adapt modern tech stacks with a lean agile development methodology. We offer rich benefits, a lucrative bonus incentive program and true work/life balance. Now's your chance to really influence what the technology development is going to look like!
